anathema: Act out a death on stage, begin a performance or tale without first inviting the gods to watch
edict: Adapt ancient works into modern language, sponsor or perform in plays or recitals, tell history to others
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Likha (The Teller)](/Deities.aspx?ID=616)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Adapt ancient works into modern language, sponsor or perform in plays or recitals, tell history to others

**Anathema** Act out a death on stage, begin a performance or tale without first inviting the gods to watch

**Area of Concern**
History, sound, truth

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45)

**Favored Weapon** [Hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=382)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=88), [Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=117)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=116), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=95)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=1568)

- **3rd**
[Enthrall](/Spells.aspx?ID=1516)

- **5th**
[Illusory Scene](/Spells.aspx?ID=1570)

</column>
name: Likha (The Teller)
